name: treatment of spent sawing slurry from Si-wafer cutting | spent sawing slurry from Si-wafer cutting | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/3346/documentation

This dataset represents the treatment of a spent sawing slurry from Si-wafer cutting from an ordinary transforming activity.;The specific weight of input slurry 1.75kg/l (wet mass).

The activity starts with the slurry being available at the gate of the treatment facility.

The activity ends with the slurry being treated and waste-specific emissions released to the environment. The output of silicon-iron mix is neglected in this inventory. Infrastructure is included.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Time of publication and data investigation.
processDocumentation.samplingDescription:
Literature and internet. Average data from 3 companies. Values as reported in Table 4.8 in Jungbluth et al. (2009).

Reference:
Jungbluth N., Stucki M, and Frischknecht R. (2009) Photovoltaics. In Dones, R. (Ed.) et al., Sachbilanzen von Energiesystemen: Grundlagen für den ökologischen Vergleich von Energiesystemen und den Einbezug von Energiesystemen in Ökobilanzen für die Schweiz. ecoinvent report No. 6-XII, Swiss Centre for Life Cycle Inventories, Dübendorf, CH, 2009.
